pullrequest.title: Polaris: raise steering wheel, add collision shapes for roll cage and handles

content.raw: The axis for the steering wheel seems to have a wrong orientation/position (or the steering wheel does) which causes bad behaviour for the steering wheel when rotating it: www.youtube.com/watch?v=1qcokXBUMbI
content.html: The axis for the steering wheel seems to have a wrong orientation/position (or the steering wheel does) which causes bad behaviour for the steering wheel when rotating it: www.youtube.com/watch?v=1qcokXBUMbI
